name: todo-mern-app-server
description: Backend for MERN Todo App with MySQL

scripts.db:create: node -e "require('dotenv').config(); const { execSync } = require('child_process'); execSync(`mysql -u ${process.env.DB_USER}${process.env.DB_PASSWORD ? ` -p${process.env.DB_PASSWORD}` : ''} -e 'CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS ${process.env.DB_NAME}'`); console.log('Database created or already exists');"
